titleStmt.title: Baptismōn didachē, the doctrine of baptisms, or, A discourse of dipping and sprinkling wherein is shewed the lawfulness of other ways of baptization, besides that of a total immersion, and objections against it answered / by William Walker ...
titleStmt.author: Walker, William, 1623-1684.

notesStmt.note: First word of title in Greek.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
